•Watch aircraft move around the world in real-time

Flightradar24 is a free app and includes all the above features. If you want even more great features from Flightradar24 | Flight Tracker there are two upgrade options—Silver & Gold—and each comes with a free trial.
 
Silver
•90 days of flight history
•More aircraft details, like serial number & age
•More flight details, like vertical speed & squawk
•Filters and alerts to find and track the flights you’re interested in
•Current weather at 3,000+ airports overlaid on the map
 
Gold 
•All the features included in Flightradar24 Silver +
•365 days of flight history
•Detailed live map weather layers for clouds & precipitation
•Aeronautical charts & oceanic tracks showing the pathways flights follow across the sky

•Extended Mode S data— even more information about a flight’s altitude, speed, and wind & temperature conditions during flight, when available
 
If you choose to upgrade to a Silver or Gold subscription, a payment will be charged to your iTunes account at the end of the free trial period. Your account will be charged for renewal within 24 hours prior to the end of the current period. Auto-renewal may be turned off at any time by going to your account settings in the iTunes Store. Silver and Gold upgrade prices are listed in the app as they vary depending on your country and currency. Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription to that publication, where applicable.

HOW IT WORKS
Most aircraft today are equipped with ADS-B transponders that transmit positional data. Flightradar24 has a rapidly growing network of 20,000 ground stations to receive this data that then shows up as aircraft moving on a map in the app. In an expanding number of regions, with the help of multilateration, we’re able to calculate the positions of aircraft that don’t have ADS-B transponders. Coverage is subject to change at any time.

What is an eSIM?
* An eSIM is embedded SIM technology. Think of it as a digital SIM card. Rather than requiring users to fiddle with SIM trays and pins, the eSIM operates within your device's firmware.

What is an eSIM data plan?
* An eSIM data plan is a prepaid data-only plan that you can install directly to your eSIM-compatible device. Think of it as a lightweight prepaid plan or virtual data SIM for whatever local carriers exist in the country you’re currently in, but without this old-school plastic SIM card you can easily lose in your pockets. eSIM is a true technological revolution and we bring it right into your eSIM compatible device!

Preizkusite najbolj priročen način plačila. 

Z mobilno aplikacijo Na poti plačujete gorivo in avtopranje iz udobja svojega vozila, Kavo na poti plačujete brez kovancev ter opravljate Hip nakupe, tako da izdelke naročate in plačujete vnaprej ter jih na prodajnem mestu le še prevzamete. Priročno, hitro in enostavno. 

Za plačilo lahko uporabite Petrol klub plačilno kartico, mBills, plačilno kartico Visa ter Mastercard ali na aplikacijo naložite dobroimetje (na prodajnem mestu Petrola). 


Natočite gorivo, plačajte in odpeljite - v štirih preprostih korakih: 

1. Skenirajte QR kodo točilnega mesta. 
2. Potrdite točilno mesto in plačilo. 
3. Natočite gorivo. 
4. Preverite račun in odpeljite! 


Natočite Kavo na poti - v treh preprostih korakih: 

1. Skenirajte QR kodo kavomata. 
2. Potrdite izbiro napitka in plačilo. 
3. Natočite kavo in uživajte! 


Operite avto - v štirih preprostih korakih: 

1. Pred pranjem potrdite svojo lokacijo (na zemljevidu ali po skenu QR kode). 
2. Izberite vrsto avtopranja in popust na Zlate točke. 
3. Potrdite plačilo. 
4. Pokažite 6-mestno številko upravljavcu avtopralnice. 


Hrano Fresh in izdelke za dom naročite vnaprej in jih čez 30 minut le še prevzemite. Hip nakup opravite v 6 preprostih korakih:  

1. Izberite želeno Petrol prodajno mesto.  
2. Košarico napolnite s hrano in izdelki.  
3. Preverite in potrdite izbrano Petrol prodajno mesto ter izberite svoj čas prevzema.  
4. Potrdite plačilo.  
5. Počakajte na potisno sporočilo ali SMS s potrditvijo vašega nakupa. Dobite ga ko osebje pregleda in potrdi vaše naročilo in čas prevzema.  
6. Svoje naročilo prevzemite ob dogovorjenem času na na izbranem Petrol prodajnem mestu. 


Funkcionalnosti: 

- Plačilo goriva iz udobja avtomobila - hitro, priročno in varno plačevanje goriva. 
- Plačilo Kave na poti brez kovancev in žetonov - enostavno plačevanje z uporabo telefona. 
- Plačilo avtopranja iz avtomobila - koda za avtopranje se izpiše na ekranu telefona. 
- Hip nakupi - naročilo in plačilo hrane Fresh ter izdelkov za dom vnaprej in prevzem ob želenem času na izbranem Petrol prodajnem mestu. Že v 30 minutah. 
- Pregled nad cenami goriv v vsakem trenutku za vsako posamezno lokacijo Petrola. 
- Lokacije prodajnih mest Petrola po storitvah: poiščite najbližje prodajno mesto Petrol na zemljevidu.

- Enostavna registracija in prijava z Moj Petrol računom ter nadaljnja prijava s prstnim odtisom ali prepoznavanjem obraza. 
- Pregledno in transparentno plačevanje z zgodovino preteklih transakcij z aplikacijo ter arhiv računov.

FAQ 

Let's go through the questions you are dying to know about me, flights bookings, cheap flights, flight deals, and much more…

How can I auto-fill my passenger information?

You'll need a BolBol account first. If you're not a member yet, you can easily sign up. You have to be signed in to your BolBol account to auto-fill your information.  

If you want to buy a flight ticket for another person, you need to go to User Settings and create a new profile for that person through ""My Contacts"" tab. Fill out the information for once and then save. This way you can buy flight tickets faster next time! 

How can I save my credit card information?

Go to your User Settings and find Saved Cards tab. Here you can safely manage, save, change or delete any of your cards. By saving credit card information, you won't need to fill out your card information and choose one of your saved cards faster when you are buying your next ticket. Crveni i Red taxi je najbolje taxi udruženje u Novom Sadu. Svi vozači su registrovani i provereni.

Kako funkcioniše:
- Crveni i Red taxi će automatski locirati vašu adresu koristeći GPS u Vašem uredjaju
